thread.title: With one year to go, Britons are as split as ever over leaving the EU

title: With one year to go, Britons are as split as ever over leaving the EU
text:
With one year to go, Britons are as split as ever over leaving the EU   01:29 
With just one year until the UK leaves the European Union, two areas of eastern England mirror how the country is still deeply torn over its membership with the bloc. Rough cut (no reporter narration).   
With just one year until the UK leaves the European Union, two areas of eastern England mirror how the country is still deeply torn over its membership with the bloc. Rough cut (no reporter narration).  //reut.rs/2pJInIw
